document.full_text: kentucky derby champion and triple crown hopeful animal kingdom drew the 11th post for the preakness stakes and was installed as the early 2-1 favorite in saturday's $1 million race at pimlico race course.
document.title: animal kingdom in 11th post for preakness
lines_and_colors: kentucky derby champion and triple crown hopeful animal kingdom drew the 11th post for the preakness stakes and was installed as the early 2-1 favorite in saturday's $1 million race at pimlico race course.
